name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: ipc.server.purge.interval
description:
Define how often calls are cleaned up in the server.
    The default is 15 minutes. The unit is minutes.

name: dfs.ha.tail-edits.rolledits.timeout
description: The timeout in seconds of calling rollEdits RPC on Active NN.

name: dfs.namenode.handler.count
description:
The number of Namenode RPC server threads that listen to
  requests from clients.
  If dfs.namenode.servicerpc-address is not configured then
  Namenode RPC server threads listen to requests from all nodes.

name: mapreduce.jobhistory.move.thread-count
description: The number of threads used to move files.

name: fs.df.interval
description: Disk usage statistics refresh interval in msec.

name: mapreduce.task.timeout
description:
The number of milliseconds before a task will be
  terminated if it neither reads an input, writes an output, nor
  updates its status string.  A value of 0 disables the timeout.
